events.name: West Virginia Mountaineers at Miami Hurricanes

headlines.description: Brad Kaaya tied a career best and Miami bowl record with four touchdown passes, and the Hurricanes finally snapped a 10-year bowl drought by beating No. 14 West Virginia 31-14 in the Russell Athl

video.headline: Miami ends 10-year bowl drought with win in Athletic Bowl

headlines.shortLinkText: Kaaya's 4 TDs lead Miami past No. 14 West Virginia, 31-14

headlines.description: Joe Williams ran for 222 yards and a touchdown and Andy Phillips kicked a 27-yard field goal with 1:24 to play to lead Utah to its 14th victory in its past 15 bowl games, 26-24 over Indiana in th

video.headline: Utah holds off Indiana to win Foster Farms Bowl

headlines.shortLinkText: Williams leads Utah past Indiana 26-24 in Foster Farms Bowl

headlines.description: Justin Jackson ran for 226 yards and three touchdowns and powered Northwestern to only its third bowl victory, 31-24 over No. 22 Pittsburgh in the Pinstripe Bowl at Yankee Stadium on Wednesday.

video.headline: Northwestern powers past Pittsburgh to win Pinstripe Bowl

headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson powers Northwestern past Pitt in Pinstripe Bowl

events.name: Texas A&M Aggies at Kansas State Wildcats

headlines.description: Jesse Ertz threw for 195 yards and a touchdown and ran for two more scores in Kansas State's 33-28 victory over Texas A&M in the Texas Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ertz accounts for 3 TDs, K-State tops Texas A&M 33-28

video.headline: Ertz accounts for 3 TDs in Kansas State's win over Texas A&M
